definitions.title: n. pr. m. 1.
definitions.body: a judge Ju Jdg 12:13, Jdg 12:15, LXX Abdwn, A LXXL Labdw(m); (Ew cp. [[בְּדָן]] 1Sa 12:11, but read [[בָּרָק]], v. [[בְּדָן]] supr.).
a Benjamite 1Ch 8:23, LXX Abadwn, A LXXL Abdwn.
son of Jehiel a Gibeonite 1Ch 8:30, 1Ch 9:36; LXX Abalwn, Sabadwn, A Abdwn, Sabdwn, LXXL Abdwn.
son of Micah 2Ch 34:20, LXX Abdodom, A LXXL Abdwn (= [[עַכְבּוֹר]] 2Ki 22:12). II.

definitions.title: n. pr. loc.
definitions.body: Levitical city in Asher Jos 21:30, 1Ch 6:59, LXX Dabbwn, Abaran, A LXXL Abdwn (20 Codd. rd. [[עַבְדּׂן]] Jos 19:28 for [[עֶבְרׂן]]), ‘ Abde, Guêrin:Gal 2, 37 cf. Buhl:Geogr. 230.
